GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an single article by given id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves all comments for a given article id

comments.author: butter_bridge
comments.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts new comment for an article id given an object with an existing username and a body, e.g. { username: 'rogersop', body: 'Great article!' }

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the votes on an article given an object of the form {'inc_votes': some_number}

updatedArticle.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
updatedArticle.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment given a valid comment_id
